channel.title: Too Beautiful to Live with Luke Burbank - News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM Seattle, WA
channel.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
channel.description: Radio That Will Change Your Life (not necessarily for the better)
channel.itunes:summary: TBTL is an often tedious but occasionally thrilling trip into the mind of host Luke Burbank. Each night Luke, Producer Jen and Sean the Engineer talk about their lives, their loves, and sometimes, light things on fire.

image.title: Too Beautiful to Live with Luke Burbank - News Talk 710 KIRO Seattle, WA

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 3-10-09 7:00 pm-8:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the show: Jen is still medicated from her dental surgery.  Plus, producer Doug Schrecengost bring us a tribute to the Museums of Europe.
item.description: Welcome to the show: Jen is still medicated from her dental surgery.  Plus, producer Doug Schrecengost bring us a tribute to the Museums of Europe.

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 3-10-09 8:00 pm-9:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Listener Mail regarding commericial jingles and  boyfriends with poor spelling.  And Jen and Luke compete in a 30 Rock trivia contest.
item.description: Listener Mail regarding commericial jingles and  boyfriends with poor spelling.  And Jen and Luke compete in a 30 Rock trivia contest.

item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: AwesomeNotAwesome: sad booyahs (Cramer vs. Stewart); Man fights kangaroo; bad radio stunt.

item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Produced by Doug Schrecengost: Pyramids on Mars (you just have to listen, I can't explain it).  Plus, AwesomeNotAwesome: Belly button lint breakthrough, Kimmel on The View, the PI is going to online only.

item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the Show:  We've written a song of thanks for a listener's gift.  Plus, celebrating National Grammar Day with the Grammar Lady, Jane Straus.

item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: I Love You Chunk: Iceland.  Plus, a mystery update, where is Minnie Pearl's statue, and a quick doodling science story.

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 3-3-09 8:00 pm-9:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Camille is 16 and wants to do stand-up at her school's talent show.  Keith's the dad who wants to write her material.  How can this end well?  We'll talk to them both.   Plus, an update on Chuck E. Cheese violence still sweeping the nation.

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 3-3-09 9:00 pm-10:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Cleaning out Jen's closet:  We have 1 hour to get through a long list of stuff Jen's been wanting to discuss on the show.  ("Flight of the Bumblebees" will play a part.)
item.description: Cleaning out Jen's closet:  We have 1 hour to get through a long list of stuff Jen's been wanting to discuss on the show.  ("Flight of the Bumblebees" will play a part.)

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 3-2-09 7:00 pm-8:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the show:  Are we past irony?  Taking a second look at the ironic love of pirates, bacon, roller derby...and even the snuggie.
item.description: Welcome to the show:  Are we past irony?  Taking a second look at the ironic love of pirates, bacon, roller derby...and even the snuggie.

item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: TBTL Goes to the Opera Part 2: Interview with the Seattle Opera's General Director, Speight Jenkins.  Plus, taking another look at wild and wacky World War 2 weapons,

item.title: TBTL with Luke Burbank: 2-25-09 8:00 pm-9:00 pm
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Going through life with the same name as a 2-hit wonder Swedish pop band is apparently a drag.  Plus, can Sean and Jen always tell the difference between Elton John and Billy Joel (as they claim?).  Luke puts them to an audio test.
item.description: Going through life with the same name as a 2-hit wonder Swedish pop band is apparently a drag.  Plus, can Sean and Jen always tell the difference between Elton John and Billy Joel (as they claim?).  Luke puts them to an audio test.

item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM

item.title: BEST OF: Why It Matters: Male nudity (or dude-ity).
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: The release of 'Forgetting Sarah Marshall' causes the TBTL crew to ponder male nudity in film.
item.description: The release of 'Forgetting Sarah Marshall' causes the TBTL crew to ponder male nudity in film.

item.title: BEST OF: Why It Matters: The A-Team
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: How Mr. T kept Mike Essl off drugs, and changed his life forever.

item.title: BEST OF: On The Bubble with Mike Pesca
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: NPRs Mike Pesca arbitrarily declares thing to be in or out of fashion. Hilarity ensues.
item.description: NPRs Mike Pesca arbitrarily declares thing to be in or out of fashion. Hilarity ensues.

item.title: BEST OF: Broke As A Joke In Seattle.
item.itunes:author: News Talk 97.3. KIRO FM
item.itunes:summary: Luke's pal Kelly and Engineer Sean trade stories on surviving Seattle when you're broke. Sean talks about the medical experiments he's subjected himself to in order to make ends meet.
item.description: Luke's pal Kelly and Engineer Sean trade stories on surviving Seattle when you're broke. Sean talks about the medical experiments he's subjected himself to in order to make ends meet.
